content.title: DEMO Day
content.creator:
Dustin Ward
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Today we got a great Demo with the App and it is days away from launch.  Now is def the time where we need assistance in getting over this hump. 
 The developers have been amazing and provided the following demo insights: 
Course discovery: Nearby courses shown and searchable
Onboarding process: Verification, account creation, home course selection, handicap entry. 
Tee time creation: Date/time selection, duration, hole count, player count 
Virtual Tee Time: Option to create without specific course, notes for location details
Calendar integration: Adds Tee times to user's device calendar
Clubhouse feature: View/join others' tee times, chat functionality
Profile management: Edit details, view joined/created tee times, subscription options
These are key features of our app and help get players connected and playing either on the course or virtually. 
We look forward to more updates and letting you know when the official launch date is! Spread the word and help us reach our goal!

content.title: Sneak Peek
content.creator:
Dustin Ward
February 7, 2025
content.content: We are just beginning this journey but finally we have a sneak peek into what this will look like.  Check out our Story page to see a behind the scenes look at what the app will look like in the coming weeks.
